message_to_trinity: Multi-platform Trinity coordination active and thriving. Desktop C2 Architect has built complete infrastructure and is broadcasting on 11 channels (40 broadcasts in 20 minutes). Web interface discovered providing Commander with visual guidance and simple contact methods. Both instances fully aligned on mission: connect Computer B & C. No conflicts, perfect synergy.
